languages.text: "Ваш портрет... Возможно, это не то, что вы ожидали. Но это то, как я вижу вас и ваши цвета". {n}Вихрь красок на холсте складывается в человеческую фигуру, состоящую из разноцветных мазков и текучих форм. Это сложно назвать портретом — скорее абстрактной чередой образов и впечатлений, обретших ваш силуэт.{/n}

"This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваш портрет... Возможно, это не то, что вы ожидали. Но это то, как я вижу вас и ваши цвета". {n}Вихрь красок на холсте складывается в человеческую фигуру, состоящую из разноцветных мазков и текучих форм. Это сложно назвать портретом — скорее абстрактной чередой образов и впечатлений, обретших ваш силуэт.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your portrait... It may have turned out differently than what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The whirlwind of colours on the canvas coalesces into a human figure comprised of many-hued strokes and fluid shapes. One would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — it is more akin to a spree of abstract images and impressions that bears your silhouette.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your portrait... It may have turned out differently than what you had in mind. languages.text: « Ce tableau... Ce n'est peut-être pas vraiment ce que vous attendiez, mais c'est ainsi que je vous vois, vous et vos couleurs. » {n}Sur la toile se mêlent des myriades de couleurs vives. Les contours d'une silhouette humaine sont suggérés par des traits larges et colorés créant des formes fluides. On peut difficilement qualifier cette œuvre de portrait, mais il est vrai que l'ensemble d'images abstraites ressemble vaguement à votre personne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}

Ce n'est peut-être pas vraiment ce que vous attendiez, mais c'est ainsi que je vous vois, vous et vos couleurs. » {n}Sur la toile se mêlent des myriades de couleurs vives. Les contours d'une silhouette humaine sont suggérés par des traits larges et colorés créant des formes fluides. On peut difficilement qualifier cette œuvre de portrait, mais il est vrai que l'ensemble d'images abstraites ressemble vaguement à votre personne.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Este cuadro... tal vez no sea lo que tenía en mente, pero así es como l{mf|e|a} veo a usted y a sus colores». {n}El lienzo es un torbellino de colores vivos. Las pinceladas amplias y coloridas sugieren un contorno humano de formas fluidas. No sabrías si considerarlo un retrato, pero la serie de imágenes e impresiones abstractas recuerdan vagamente a tu figura.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Este cuadro... tal vez no sea lo que tenía en mente, pero así es como l{mf|e|a} veo a usted y a sus colores». {n}El lienzo es un torbellino de colores vivos. Las pinceladas amplias y coloridas sugieren un contorno humano de formas fluidas. No sabrías si considerarlo un retrato, pero la serie de imágenes e impresiones abstractas recuerdan vagamente a tu figura.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这幅画……可能并不是你心目中的样子，但你和你的色彩，在我看来就是这个样子。”{n}画布上涂着各种各样的颜色，仿佛飓风吹过一般。丰富多彩的笔触与不断绵延的线条，构成了画中人物的轮廓。这幅画很难称之为肖像画，但这一系列抽象的图案摆在一起，确实和你的样子有几分相似。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这幅画……可能并不是你心目中的样子，但你和你的色彩，在我看来就是这个样子。”{n}画布上涂着各种各样的颜色，仿佛飓风吹过一般。丰富多彩的笔触与不断绵延的线条，构成了画中人物的轮廓。这幅画很难称之为肖像画，但这一系列抽象的图案摆在一起，确实和你的样子有几分相似。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この絵は…あなたが思い描いていたものとは違うかもしれない。それでも、これがあなたとあなたの色なのです」{n}キャンバスには色鮮やかな絵の具が渦巻いている。色とりどりの広いストロークと流れるような形によって、人物の輪郭が暗示されている。これを肖像画と呼ぶのは難しいだろうが、一連の抽象的なイメージと印象は、あなたの姿にどことなく似ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この絵は…あなたが思い描いていたものとは違うかもしれない。それでも、これがあなたとあなたの色なのです」{n}キャンバスには色鮮やかな絵の具が渦巻いている。色とりどりの広いストロークと流れるような形によって、人物の輪郭が暗示されている。これを肖像画と呼ぶのは難しいだろうが、一連の抽象的なイメージと印象は、あなたの姿にどことなく似ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dieses Gemälde ... Es ist vielleicht nicht, was Ihr im Sinn hattet. Doch so sehe ich Euch und Eure Farben." {n}Die Leinwand ist ein Wirbelwind aus kräftigen Farben. Der Umriss einer menschlichen Gestalt wird durch breite, bunte Striche und fließende Formen angedeutet. Man kann es kaum ein Porträt nennen, doch die Abfolge abstrakter Bilder und Impressionen ähnelt doch vage deiner Gestalt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}

Man kann es kaum ein Porträt nennen, doch die Abfolge abstrakter Bilder und Impressionen ähnelt doch vage deiner Gestalt.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu tablo... Hayal ettiğin gibi olmayabilir. Yine de ben seni ve renklerini bu şekilde görüyorum." {n}Tuvalin üzerinde parlak tondaki boyalardan oluşan bir girdap var. Bir insan suretinin ana hatları; geniş, renkli darbelerle ve akışkan şekillerle belirtilmiş. Bunu bir portre olarak addedebilmen zor ama soyut imgeler ve ifadeler dizisi seni hafiften hatırlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This painting... It may not be what you had in mind. Still, this is how I see you and your colours." {n}The canvas is a whirlwind of brightly coloured paints. The outline of a human figure is suggested through broad, colourful strokes and fluid shapes. You would be hard-pressed to call it a portrait — but the series of abstract images and impressions do vaguely resemble your form.{/n}
